content: down-to-earth socks for magic loop sometimes the best sock is the humble down-to -earth sock whether you re looking to showcase a special yarn that doesn t need any fancy stitch patterns or looking for a relaxing tv project this pattern is for you the pattern is written for cuff down socks specifically for the magic loop method of knitting in the round it features a 2x2 ribbed cuff a
